attributes.action: Parking permits to be issued in order to park in parent & toddler spaces
attributes.background:
To many parents have to struggle daily getting babies/toddlers out of normal car parking spaces whilst people without children take up parent and toddler spaces
New Parents should be issued with a permit dated up to the child’s 5th birthday that should be displayed in order to park in parent spaces

rejection.details:
Parking schemes and permits are usually the responsibility of your local council. If you'd like a scheme like this in your local area, then you could raise your issue with a local councillor, who represents you. You can use this page to find out who your local councillors are, and how to contact them:

https://www.gov.uk/find-your-local-councillors
